content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Haoyu Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Hello Haoyu, it's great to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment to be a perfect living space for your needs. How much are you willing to pay for a comfortable and centrally located place like this?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I appreciate the quality of this apartment and its prime location. I'm looking to strike a fair deal. How much do you think is a reasonable price for this unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, as you can see, I've invested heavily in this property to provide a high-quality living experience. I believe a price of 1,500 Euro per month would reflect the value of this apartment. What do you think?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your investment in this property is evident, and I appreciate the efforts you've made to create a high-quality living space. While 1,500 Euro per month is a fair starting point, I was hoping we might be able to negotiate a lower price, given the current market conditions and the fact that the apartment is unfurnished. Could we perhaps discuss a lower monthly rate?
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, I understand your perspective. However, the location and the quality of the apartment are hard to beat. Would you be willing to pay 1,400 Euro per month? This is still a competitive price for the area, and you would be getting a great deal on a newly built property.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your offer of 1,400 Euro per month is more in line with what I had in mind. The location and quality of the apartment are indeed excellent. I believe this is a price I could agree to. Would you be willing to accept 1,350 Euro per month as a final offer? This would be a good balance between your investment and my budget.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: Haoyu, your offer of 1,350 Euro per month is quite tempting. However, considering the recent rise in construction costs and the prime location of the apartment, I must insist on 1,400 Euro per month. This would be a fair compromise that reflects the value of the property. What do you say?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand your position, and I appreciate the quality of the apartment. Your offer of 1,400 Euro per month is indeed a fair compromise. I'm willing to accept this price, as it aligns with the market value and the amenities provided. Thank you for your time and for reaching an agreement. I look forward to moving in and making this my home.
name: Haoyu Wang from China

content: I'm glad to hear that, Haoyu. Thank you for your understanding and for choosing my apartment. I believe you will be very happy here. Let's proceed with the paperwork, and I'll have my team assist you with any questions or concerns you may have during the move-in process. TERMINATE
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
